title: StarCraft Cinematics DVD - Limited Edition
description:
The epic cinematics of StarCraft & Brood War have finally been released in DVD quality.
Witness the struggle for galactic domination in all of its uninterrupted glory!

Features:
* 36 minutes of high resolution digital animation
* Digitally remastered for enhanced picture & sound
* Exclusive director's commentary
* Original development artwork
* Unreleased storyboards from the Blizzard Film Department
* Includes full trailers for StarCraft & Brood War.
* Bonus trailers for Diablo II, Lord of Destruction, and WarCraft III!
